context.summary: SF sublet listings group where members share available housing and sublet opportunities. Recent posts include 2bed/1bath in Noe Valley, master bedroom in SOMA, Mission Bay apartments, Potrero Hill loft, Marina studio, and various short-term rental options throughout San Francisco.
